q: why do they want to display the tools before the video starts
pred: The tools displayed in the video are likely to be used for the maintenance and repair of the skis. The man in the video is seen using a tool to sharpen the skis, and the tools displayed in the video are likely to be used for this purpose. By displaying the tools before the video starts, the viewer can better understand the process and the tools involved in the maintenance and repair of the skis.
